Directing

Video reel

Before pivoting into technology, I was a freelance director for seven years working in Los Angeles’ entertainment industry. This is a video reel containing select projects throughout my directing career.

I worked primarily in the independent music scene documenting artists throughout their creative process. My directing journey started in beauty content, working with brands such as CoverGirl, Teen Vogue, and Seventeen Magazine, and transitioned into the music world after documenting the finishing process of Jesse Boykins III’s album Bartholomew for LANDR.
